short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove all the annoying clutter from your Twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes all the annoying clutter from Twitter and allows you to basically just enjoy the platform without promoted tweets, login requirements and more!
